ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card +
<4> Spare LP-E8 Battery + <5> Battery Charger for LP-E8 + <6> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> Additional Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <9> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <10> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with EF 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Battery & Charger + Backpack + Filters + Accessory Kit
